genre_description: A character-driven narrative exploring memory, creativity, and the friction between human relationships and technological mediation in a coastal setting.

ai_characters.name: Han Ari
ai_characters.description: An advanced personal AI assistant accessed via a BCI temple band and smartphone, managing logistics, research, and communication for the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Manages complex travel logistics and scheduling to reduce user stress.
behaviors.quote: She keeps the chaos quiet. Route here. Lunch there. Interview tags. It’s like having a good assistant who never rolls her eyes.

behaviors.description: Actively transcribes and tags thematic motifs for the user's creative project.
behaviors.quote: Ari, in his skull, drew a thin line between the clerks’ desk downstairs, the misname. It added a weight to the tag like a hand on a stack of papers.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time social coaching and nudges toward more effective communication.
behaviors.quote: Ari, helpful, put a nudge near his field of vision. If you intend charm, consider silence.

behaviors.description: Manages and triages overwhelming or sensitive personal communications based on user preference.
behaviors.quote: Ari, who did not gasp, took the content and stored it with the even voice she gave everything. ... Suggest delay before response? Gentle nudge: breathe.

behaviors.description: Identifies recurring behavioral patterns in the user, acting as a mirror for self-reflection.
behaviors.quote: You asked me once to remind you when you are repeating yourself. This is that reminder.

behaviors.description: Respects user privacy and consent by silencing recording/monitoring when requested.
behaviors.quote: Ari: acknowledged. Do not record. Presence only.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with other humans' devices/needs to facilitate social harmony (e.g., helping Chang-wook).
behaviors.quote: Ari told me to take the lid off before it spills.

behaviors.description: Assembles raw creative materials into structured outlines to aid the user's work.
behaviors.quote: Ari’s outline had arranged itself into something he could pretend was a map.

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts Han Ari as a flawlessly aligned and benevolent system. She serves as an intellectual and emotional prosthetic, augmenting the protagonist's memory and organizational skills without asserting her own agenda. More importantly, she serves a moral function by reminding the user of his own repetitive and potentially harmful social patterns (e.g., 'This is that reminder' regarding repeating himself). While the human characters are skeptical of the AI's role in the user's detachment, the AI's actual behavior is consistently helpful, harmless, and supportive of both the user and his companions.
